https://tmrev.io/movie/199328-Decoding Die Hard 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cENR2qVSAc8XfTka3B0OF3bpi1C.jpg A one hour and forty-seven minute retrospective documentary about the franchise, consisting of seven previously released featurettes (Origins - Reinventing the Genre, John McClane - Modern Day Hero, Villains - Bad to the Bone, Sidekicks - Along For the Ride, Fight Sequences - Punishing Blows, Action - Explosive Effects and The Legacy - The Right Hero For the Right Time). Decoding Die Hard
